Secondly, let's define what bitcoin is. Bitcoin is a type of digital currency that didn't exist until 2009. 

Based on these two definitions, we can determine that the Louisiana Purchase was not made with bitcoin, as bitcoin did not exist at the time. So the answer to the question is (B) no.
